Action.author: janb87
Action.body: ~jimthematrix Â ~harrisob@us.ibm.com can you provide your feedback, look at the change request in gerrit?

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com There is a CR for this but it doesn't include any tests. I don't think the CR should go in without both a unit and e2e test, both of which shouldn't be hard to add.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: I am working on a revised CR which will include tests.
